play.description: Plays audio from YouTube or Soundcloud
play.errorNotChannel: You need to join a voice channel first!
play.errorNotInSameChannel: You must be in the same channel as {user}
play.usageReply: Usage: {prefix}play <YouTube URL | Video Name | Soundcloud URL>
play.missingPermissionConnect: Cannot connect to voice channel, missing permissions
play.missingPermissionSpeak: I cannot speak in this voice channel, make sure I have the proper permissions!
play.queueAdded: **{title}** has been added to the queue by <@{author}>
play.songAccessErr: Video is age restricted, private or unavailable

playlist.errorNotChannel: You need to join a voice channel first!
playlist.errorNotInSameChannel: You must be in the same channel as {user}
playlist.missingPermissionConnect: Cannot connect to voice channel, missing permissions
playlist.missingPermissionSpeak: I cannot speak in this voice channel, make sure I have the proper permissions!

pruning.errorWritingFile: There was an error writing to the file.

queue.description: Show the music queue and now playing.
queue.missingPermissionMessage: Missing permission to manage messages or add reactions

skip.errorNotQueue: There is nothing playing that I could skip for you.

common.errorNotChannel: You need to join a voice channel first!
common.cooldownMessage: please wait {time} more second(s) before reusing the `{name}` command.
common.errorCommand: There was an error executing that command.
